SR: MA (09.08.2001 12:04:06)1. Go to the preference page and navigate to Workbench > File Editors.2. Without selecting anything from the 'Internal Editors' section, switch to the 'External Editors' section and select an entry.3. Switch back to the 'Internal Editors' section. There is still no selection.4. Press OK. This should add the selected external editor as the default entry in the associated editors list.
